name: strawberry
description: Single file frontend framework for Single File Applications

scripts.size: yarn run fullsize && yarn run minfsize
scripts.fullsize: esbuild . --bundle | tee temp.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "full uncomp: %.4f KB\n", $1/1024 }' && gzip -c temp.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "full gzippd: %.4f KB\n", $1/1024}' && rm temp.js
scripts.minfsize: esbuild . --bundle --minify | tee temp.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "minf uncomp: %.4f KB\n", $1/1024 }' && gzip -c temp.js | wc -c | awk '{printf "minf gzippd: %.4f KB\n", $1/1024}' && rm temp.js
